title: Sob Press√£o
overview: The drama follows the daily routine of a medical staff from a public hospital in the suburbs of Rio de Janeiro. On the one hand, the skeptic Dr. Evandro, chief surgeon of this team. On the other side, the religious and efficient vascular surgeon, Dr. Carolina, who seeks in faith the antidote against all the miserable who lives day by day. Work partners, both have in common the desire to save lives and need to find a balance between the craft and the intimate conflicts to face the chaotic environment of the emergency hospital.
